entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:46 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -35.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy

Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
